pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simple 'htmlwidgets' Image Viewer with WebGL Brightness/Contrast // Display a 2D-matrix data as a interactive zoomable gray- scale image viewer, providing tools for manual data inspection. The viewer window shows cursor guiding lines and a corresponding data slices for both axes at the current cursor position. A tool-bar allows adjusting image display brightness/contrast through WebGL filters and performing basic high-pass/low-pass filtering.
